channel.title: Question old one, new one needs answering
channel.description: how do you enter a question in a text based program? like [code]how much money did you make?[/code] and have time for them to answer and, how do you make it so it says "press any key to continue?

item.title: Question old one, new one needs answering
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

blah bah7:

thx, but how do you store that input into a variable

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:77923”]http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/util/Scanner.html

Scanner keyBoard = new Scanner(System.in);
System.out.println(“type a string:”);
String nextLine = keyBoard.nextLine();[/quote]

The bolded word is the variable you want.

Read full topic
item.source: Question old one, new one needs answering

item.title: Question old one, new one needs answering
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

String nextLine;
//thats you’ve variable

nextLine = keyBoard.nextLine();
//puts something in it

//now you can do what you want with that variable
System.out.println(nextLine);
System.out.println(“length:”+nextLine.length());

Read full topic
